text: 8:3 Aposel 13:38-39; 15:10; Rom 3:20; 2 Korin 5:21; Filipai 2:7; Hibru 4:15; 7:18-19En navir ghuriba, gavgaviba puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Moses Osirizir Araziba, en arazir kurabar gɨn amangamin gavgaviba puvatɨ. Ezɨ Moses Osirizir Araziba damuan koghamin bizir kam, God uabɨ a gami. God uan Otarim amadazɨ, a gumazimɨn mɨn otogha, arazir kurabagh amir gumazimɨn mɨn gari. A en arazir kuraba agɨvasa izezɨ, an ingangarimɨn tuavimɨn, God gumazamiziba itir arazir kurabar gavgavim agɨvagha a gasɨghasɨki.
